eu_initiatives: All proposals in relation to the Energy Union, especially concerning security of supply and market design.
section: VI - Organisations representing local, regional and municipal authorities, other public or mixed entities, etc.
subsection: Other public or mixed entities, created by law whose purpose is to act in the public interest
membership: Energinet.dk participates in ENTSO-E and ENTSOG, the European umbrella organisations for electricity and gas TSO (Transmission System Operators) respectively.
goals__remit:
Energinet.dk owns and operates the Danish electricity- and gastransmission grids and is responsible for the security of supply. Energinet.dk is an independent public Company and works for the greater good of the Danish society.  
 
Security of Supply 
On of Energinet.dk’s core tasks is security of supply. It is our responsibility that the electricity and gassystems are well-functioning in order to ensure that citizens and companies have electricity and gas now and in the future. 
 
Well-functioning markets 
Energinet.dk creates the framework for well-functioning markets for electricity and gas to ensure fair prices both for energy consumers and energy producers. 
 
Efficient transition 
Energinet.dk contributes to the green transition of the energy system and helps to ensure that the transition will be for the benefit for the Danish society. 
 
Support for clean energy 
Energinet.dk handles a number of tasks on behalf of the society that support the political ambition concerning a green transition. This includes payout of support for clean energy.
